sentences.chinese: 雪花輕輕地落在窗玻璃上。

sentences.english: One of our windowpanes is cracked .
sentences.chinese: 我們的窗玻璃裂了一塊。

sentences.english: He was snapped making sure the windows were sparkling by a resident in a neighbouring apartment block.
sentences.chinese: 他煩惱一定是鄰近公寓樓的住戶讓窗玻璃發出閃光。

sentences.english: Install window glass channel and belt weatherstrip seals.
sentences.chinese: 安裝車窗玻璃滑動槽和皮帶防水飾條密封。

sentences.english: The demonstrators broke windows and set fire.
sentences.chinese: 遊行者砸破窗玻璃，還放了火。

sentences.english: The rain was whipping the window-panes.
Uses pane is the sandwich glass with higher safety performance.
sentences.chinese: 所使用的窗玻璃是安全性能較高的夾層玻璃。

sentences.english: The windows had frosted over in the night.
sentences.chinese: 窗玻璃上在夜間結了一層冰。

sentences.english: It is the middle of the summer, but there is an unseasonal mist pressing against the windowpanes .
sentences.chinese: 現在是仲夏，窗玻璃上卻蒙着一層不合時令的霧氣。

sentences.english: Through the glass I could see the very bridge I had left just a few moments before.
sentences.chinese: 透過窗玻璃，我可以看到了剛纔經過的那座橋。

sentences.english: After breaking the window the children ran like stink down the street.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們打破窗玻璃後，就拼命地朝街那頭逃去。

sentences.english: In case of emergency use pointed end to strike the car window glass if passe…
sentences.chinese: 車禍時用來打碎車窗玻璃，割斷安全帶，緊急逃生。

sentences.english: A southwest shower lashed the window-panes .
sentences.chinese: 西南風送來的雨拍打着窗玻璃。

sentences.english: Only when the train's speed and pitch changed did the windowpane become silent.
sentences.chinese: 只有當火車的速度和距離改變了，窗玻璃才靜止下來。

sentences.english: Mummy, he said, Bobby's broken 3 a window in Mrs. Allen's house.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽，他說，波比打碎了艾倫太太家的窗玻璃。

sentences.english: The yellow smoke that rubs its muzzle on the window-panes.
sentences.chinese: 黃色的霧在窗玻璃上擦着它的背。

definition: car window/window of vehicle (bus, train etc)
mirror showing a view to one's rear (including rearview mirror, side-view mirror, baby view mirror etc)
window/the opening panel of a window
